reviewText:
Rather than give long reviews on both movies, let me just describe what kind of movies I like and how these fit into those likes.

The movies I like have a strong story line, and action.

Both of these movies fulfill those requirements.
Both movies were superb! Plenty of suspense and action. There was no problem playing the disc. They were an excellant buy at the price.
Just a believable story with great images!  Whalberg a great lead, but they shot his dog!  Lots of action for the action nuts!

Two of Mark's best movies, in my opinion, from an action-comedy-drama Four Brothers to an action-thriller Shooter, both with great elements of each genre. The supporting characters are equally strong, especially in Four Brothers, which offers a deeper feeling of drama bent on family-oriented revenge. Shooter is more about revenge from one character, and a greater plot on a national scale.

For this price in one Blu-Ray package, it's ideal to have.

if ur a fan of action films like myself then these two films are for you. They are great films with great actors great acting and even better action and story then mos action movies out there its really a no brainer.
My husband loves both movies and having them both on one is great. It made a great just because I love you gift.

For a double feature, u can't go wrong with that. both films I have seen the preview for and I like them both. that being said, I give it two thumbs up for price, thought of buying just one film I wanted but u can't beat 2 for the price of 1. Great buy. excellent seller.
Mark Walberg at his best. I liked this so much I have two on Blu Ray! I recommend this one 100%.

These are two great movies. I am a little partial because I really like Donny and Mark Wahlberg. They are both great actors and you can't go wrong with a movie by Mark. These two movies are really good. Some of his best work.
Shooter is one of my favorite films of all time.  Unfortuneatly the audio isn't DTS-HD or TrueHD, but it still looks great and sounded fine.  Having Four Brothers as a bonus disc was nice.
Two of my favorite movies in one package!
Great films on Blue-Ray these films are well acted and written.
